vocabinfos.mediumDef:
A man living at the time of the Patriarchs, only mentioned at Gen.22.24;
son of: Nahor (H5152H) and Reumah (H7208);
brother of: Tebah (H2875), Gaham (H1514) and Tahash (H8477);
half-brother of: Uz (H5780H), Buz (H0938), Kemuel (H7055), Chesed (H3777), Hazo (H2375), Pildash (H6394), Jidlaph (H3044) and Bethuel (H1328A)
§ Maachah = "oppression"
n pr m
1) father of Achish, king of Gath at the beginning of Solomon's reign
2) father of Hanan, one of David's mighty warriors
3) a Simeonite, father of Shephatiah, prince of his tribe in the reign of David
4) son of Nahor by concubine Reumah
n pr f
5) daughter of king Talmai of Geshur, wife or David, and mother of Absalom
6) daughter of Absalom, wife of king Rehoboam of Judah, and mother of king Abijam of Judah
7) concubine of Caleb the son of Hezron
8) wife of Machir of the tribe of Manasseh
9) wife of Jehiel, father of Gibeon
Maachathites = "pressure (literally she has pressed)"
n pr
10) a mercenary people hired to fight David
vocabinfos._es_Definition: (a)   hijo de Nahor; (b) מַעֲכָת   pueblo, lugar; (c)   hija de Talmai, rey de Guesur; esposa de David; madre de Absalón; (d)   padre de Aquís, rey de Gat; (e)   hija de Absalón; madre de Abiam, rey de Judá; (f)   hija de Absalón; madre y abuela de Asá, rey de Judá; (g)   concubina de Caleb; (h)   hija de Manasés; (i)   esposa de Maquir, hijo de Manasés; (j)   esposa de Jehiel, fundador de Gabaón; (k)   guerrero; en tiempos del rey David; (l)   padre de Sefatías; tribu de Simeón
vocabinfos._zh_tw_Definition:
瑪迦 这个字在希伯來文的意思是 "壓制"
陽性專有名詞
1) 所羅門在位時期之始的迦特王亞吉的父親(王上 2:39)
2) 大衛的諸勇士之一哈難的父親(代上 11:43)
3) 西緬人, 大衛統治時期西緬支派之長示法提雅的父親(代上 27:16)
4) 拿鶴藉妾流瑪所生的兒子(創 22:24)
陰性專有名詞
5) 基述王達買的女兒, 大衛之妻, 並為押沙龍之母(代上 3:2)
6) 押沙龍之女, 猶大王羅波安之妻, 並為猶大王亞比雅之母(代下 11:20-22;15:16)
7) 希斯崙之子迦勒的妾(代上 2:48)
8) 瑪拿西支派瑪吉之妻(代上 7:16)
9) 基遍的父親耶利之妻(代上 8:29)
專有名詞 種族名稱
瑪迦人 = "壓制 (字意是她被壓制)"
10) 被僱來攻打大衛的一族外籍傭兵
vocabinfos._zh_Definition:
玛迦 这个字在希伯来文的意思是 "压制"
阳性专有名词
1) 所罗门在位时期之始的迦特王亚吉的父亲(王上 2:39)
2) 大卫的诸勇士之一哈难的父亲(代上 11:43)
3) 西缅人, 大卫统治时期西缅支派之长示法提雅的父亲(代上 27:16)
4) 拿鹤藉妾流玛所生的儿子(创 22:24)
阴性专有名词
5) 基述王达买的女儿, 大卫之妻, 并为押沙龙之母(代上 3:2)
6) 押沙龙之女, 犹大王罗波安之妻, 并为犹大王亚比雅之母(代下 11:20-22;15:16)
7) 希斯仑之子迦勒的妾(代上 2:48)
8) 玛拿西支派玛吉之妻(代上 7:16)
9) 基遍的父亲耶利之妻(代上 8:29)
专有名词 种族名称
玛迦人 = "压制 (字意是她被压制)"
10) 被雇来攻打大卫的一族外籍佣兵

vocabinfos.mediumDef:
Combined with a.ram (אֲרָם "Aram" H0758K)
§ Maachah = "oppression"
n pr m
This name is used for:
1) father of Achish, king of Gath at the beginning of Solomon's reign
2) father of Hanan, one of David's mighty warriors
3) a Simeonite, father of Shephatiah, prince of his tribe in the reign of David
4) son of Nahor by concubine Reumah
n pr f
5) daughter of king Talmai of Geshur, wife or David, and mother of Absalom
6) daughter of Absalom, wife of king Rehoboam of Judah, and mother of king Abijam of Judah
7) concubine of Caleb the son of Hezron
8) wife of Machir of the tribe of Manasseh
9) wife of Jehiel, father of Gibeon
Maachathites = "pressure (literally she has pressed)"
n pr
10) a mercenary people hired to fight David

A woman living at the time of United Monarchy, only mentioned at 2Sa.3.3;
daughter of: Talmai (H8526H); married to David (H1732);
mother of: Absalom (H0053)

vocabinfos.mediumDef:
A woman of the tribe of Judah living at the time of United Monarchy, first mentioned at 1Ki.15.2;
daughter of: Uriel (H0222I) and Tamar (H8559I); married to Rehoboam (H7346);
mother of: Abijah (H0029I), Attai (H6262I), Ziza (H2124H) and Shelomith (H8019G); also called Micaiah (KJV: Michaiah) at 2Ch.13.2;
§ Maachah = "oppression"
n pr m
1) father of Achish, king of Gath at the beginning of Solomon's reign
2) father of Hanan, one of David's mighty warriors
3) a Simeonite, father of Shephatiah, prince of his tribe in the reign of David
4) son of Nahor by concubine Reumah
n pr f
5) daughter of king Talmai of Geshur, wife or David, and mother of Absalom
6) daughter of Absalom, wife of king Rehoboam of Judah, and mother of king Abijam of Judah
7) concubine of Caleb the son of Hezron
8) wife of Machir of the tribe of Manasseh
9) wife of Jehiel, father of Gibeon
Maachathites = "pressure (literally she has pressed)"
n pr
10) a mercenary people hired to fight David

mother of: Peresh (H6570), Sheresh (H8329)

vocabinfos.mediumDef:
A man living at the time of United Monarchy, only mentioned at 1Sa.27.2;
father of: Achish (H0397); also called Maacah (KJV: Maachah; NIV: Maakah) at 1Ki.2.39;
Another name of ma.okh (מָעוֹךְ "Maoch" H4582)
§ Maachah = "oppression"
n pr m
1) father of Achish, king of Gath at the beginning of Solomon's reign
2) father of Hanan, one of David's mighty warriors
3) a Simeonite, father of Shephatiah, prince of his tribe in the reign of David
4) son of Nahor by concubine Reumah
n pr f
5) daughter of king Talmai of Geshur, wife or David, and mother of Absalom
6) daughter of Absalom, wife of king Rehoboam of Judah, and mother of king Abijam of Judah
7) concubine of Caleb the son of Hezron
8) wife of Machir of the tribe of Manasseh
9) wife of Jehiel, father of Gibeon
Maachathites = "pressure (literally she has pressed)"
n pr
10) a mercenary people hired to fight David

vocabinfos.mediumDef:
Also named: ma.a.kha.ti (מַעֲכָתִי "Maacathite" H4602)
§ Maachah = "oppression"
n pr m
This name is used for:
1) father of Achish, king of Gath at the beginning of Solomon's reign
2) father of Hanan, one of David's mighty warriors
3) a Simeonite, father of Shephatiah, prince of his tribe in the reign of David
4) son of Nahor by concubine Reumah
n pr f
5) daughter of king Talmai of Geshur, wife or David, and mother of Absalom
6) daughter of Absalom, wife of king Rehoboam of Judah, and mother of king Abijam of Judah
7) concubine of Caleb the son of Hezron
8) wife of Machir of the tribe of Manasseh
9) wife of Jehiel, father of Gibeon
Maachathites = "pressure (literally she has pressed)"
n pr
10) a mercenary people hired to fight David
